events.name: PostCreated
events.description: A new post is created to share food import updates.

events.name: PostUpdated
events.description: An existing post is updated with new information.

events.name: PostDeleted
events.description: Removes a post from the system.

commands.name: CreatePost
commands.description: A new post is created to share food import updates.

commands.name: UpdatePost
commands.description: An existing post is updated with new information.

commands.name: DeletePost
commands.description: Removes a post from the system.

integrationPoints.name: UserManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integration needed to manage user permissions on posts.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Posts should reflect available food inventory.

integrationPoints.name: Analytics
integrationPoints.description: Post interactions should be sent for analytics.
